channel.title: Adjusting frequency range of the mangOH Yellow antenna
channel.description:
The **frequency range** of the mangOH Yellow chip antenna **can be changed an adapted** to your needs quite easily by just tuning the matching network. **Without changing the antenna part or having to make a custom design** you will get the antenna to work on **the frequencies you need**. This is enable by a new generation of chip antenna components called 'antenna boosters'. You can use Cadence AWR, Optenni or similar tools to automatically tune the matching network. See paper at MWEE here:
https://www.mwee.com/design-center/virtual-antenna-iot-design

item.title: Adjusting frequency range of the mangOH Yellow antenna
item.dc:creator: Carles
item.description:
The frequency range of the mangOH Yellow chip antenna can be changed an adapted to your needs quite easily by just tuning the matching network. Without changing the antenna part or having to make a custom design you will get the antenna to work on the frequencies you need. This is enable by a new generation of chip antenna components called ‘antenna boosters’. You can use Cadence AWR, Optenni or similar tools to automatically tune the matching network. See paper at MWEE here:

www.mwee.com – 20 Sep 19

Virtual Antenna™ for easy design of IoT devices with embedded antennas

Virtual Antenna™ technology enables one antenna component to cover all IoT frequency bands. This article describes the main features of Virtual Antenna™ technology and shows a simple design flow comprising only three simple steps.

Read full topic
item.source: Adjusting frequency range of the mangOH Yellow antenna
